title: Remaining seats left after round 1 counselling

comments.body: Although aiml had more like 90 seats left after round 1

iit/nit: lemme introduce myself -

Sour grapes man. Stop the fear-mongering, incidents happen everywhere and involve a lot of factors. What happened here can very well happen tomorrow (and does happen) at other colleges. PES has its flaws but it has consistently been one of the best options here in the city and state.
